name: Derrick Sharp
description:
Derrick Sharp loves Israel.

He has lived in Israel for 15 years.

He says that he "feels totally Israeli".

He has starred for Israel's national basketball team.

He is a naturalized Israeli citizen.

He was one of the "faces of Israel" in a state-run advertising campaign.

He has led his Israeli club team to 11 championships and three European titles.

He has fathered four Israeli children by two Israeli wives.

But that doesn't make him a Jew.
